aka: Fox and Hare Save the Forest

cast.name: 丹·伦顿·斯金纳 Dan Renton Skinner

awards:
第74届柏林国际电影节(2024)
　　新生代儿童单元 国际评审团最佳长片(提名) 玛莎·哈伯斯塔德

director.name: 玛莎·哈伯斯塔德 Mascha Halberstad

this_title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
trans_title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
introduction: A group of happy animal friends live in a beautiful big forest. One day, unusual things start to happen: the Owl has gone missing, and the river spills over and is getting closer to their homes. Led by the Fox and the Hare, the animals unite in search of their friend the Owl, to find out what is going on, and to save their homes…
foreign_title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
